item.title: New mural improves evolving Capitol Hill streetscape
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
The original Capitol Hill commercial district south across the river from downtown Oklahoma City has gained a new mural created by one of the city’s newer muralists, Sergio Ramirez. The Capitol Hill Civic group toured the mural called “My Brush” Thursday morning between rain showers and heard Ramirez explain the variety of images depicting the […]

The post New mural improves evolving Capitol Hill streetscape appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: Pete White Health and Wellness Center opens for all age groups
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
The ribbon was cut Friday on the newest senior wellness center built with MAPS 3 money in the oldest part of the southside Capitol Hill area. It will be called the Pete White Health and Wellness Center. Former Oklahoma City Council member Pete White called the naming of the 39,000 square-foot center after him a […]

The post Pete White Health and Wellness Center opens for all age groups appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: Capitol Hill neighbors have big ideas for Strong Neighborhoods Initiative
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
Over two hours into the first public meeting for the Capitol Hill Strong Neighborhoods Initiative Tuesday, most of the neighbors were still there and still coming up with ideas for what that part of the city needs. After years of feeling like they were on their own, south side neighbors just across the Oklahoma River […]

The post Capitol Hill neighbors have big ideas for Strong Neighborhoods Initiative appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: Capitol View, Capitol Hill neighborhoods chosen for next revitalization
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
The Capitol View and Capitol Hill neighborhoods were selected by the Oklahoma City Council Tuesday for nationally-funded revitalization spending coordinated by the city. The program is called Strong Neighborhoods Initiative, or SNI. It will invest money, planning and staff time into the two neighborhoods and will also promote more private development. The stated mission of […]

The post Capitol View, Capitol Hill neighborhoods chosen for next revitalization appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: Capitol Hill Civic group tours library construction with U.S. Rep Russell
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
The Capitol Hill Civic Group walked from Grill on the Hill Thursday morning to the new Capitol Hill Library branch under construction at SW 26 and Hudson. “This is going to have many more ways for this community to connect to the internet and a way array of information,” said Tim Rogers, Executive Director of […]

The post Capitol Hill Civic group tours library construction with U.S. Rep Russell appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: New OCCC satellite campus nears completion
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
For more photos see the gallery at the bottom of this page Oklahoma City Community College is investing around $8 million overall in the future of the historic, but often neglected Capitol Hill retail area. That part of the south side of Oklahoma City dates back to 1904, three years before statehood. The OCCC main […]

The post New OCCC satellite campus nears completion appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.
